title: 820-3115-B Chime but no video.
message: Have a 820-3115-B that came in w/ liquid damage originally. Have it up now but only chimes w/ no video (external or internal). Any help w/ this would be awesome. Thank you in advance.

title: 820-3115-B Chime but no video.
message:
Is LCD_PWR_EN present at U9000?

Where was the liquid damage?

What voltage is present on L9004/L9008?

title: 820-3115-B Chime but no video.
message: All have voltage, backlit is present but no video. L9004/L9008 have 3.3.

title: 820-3115-B Chime but no video.
message: Board went through ultrasonic prior to getting to me. Kind of hard to tell to be honest where most of the damage was at.

title: 820-3115-B Chime but no video.
message:
Wait is this one of those LP133WX2-TLGV screens being used here? They do that until you boot into an OS.

Try an original screen like LP133WX3-TLA* or LTN133AT09

title: 820-3115-B Chime but no video.
message: Test all LVDS lines on diode mode at the LCD connector, positive to GND. Missing L9080 is a common problem. This is of course when you already tested a known good LCD assembly.
